summary: Vivian, a shy self-conscious college freshman, transforms into a new person after she rooms with a popular coed.
cast: Alexis Knapp|Cassie Steele|Max Lloyd-Jones|Rami Kahlon|Jake Croker|Shae Keebler|Laci J Mailey|Patti Allan|Marilyn Potts|Gerrick Winston|Amrit Sandhu|Kirk Heuser|Julia Maxwell|Chantelle Han|Yan Joseph|Kato Alexander|Jakob Rogan|Maria Fernandez|Jenna Rene|Jasmine Zoeretta
title: The Dorm
